description.value:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the Knowledge Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Knowledge Domain Spells
Cleric LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCommand000]{Command}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplIdentify00]{Identify}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAugury0000]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSuggestion]{Suggestion}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplNondetecti]{Nondetection}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpeakWithD]{Speak with Dead}
7th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplArcaneEye0]{Arcane Eye}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplConfusion0]{Confusion}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLegendLore]{Legend Lore}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplScrying000]{Scrying}
